answers.answer: Please have a thorough evaluation by an Eye MD.  Diabetes can cause blindness.  Hypertension plus diabetes together increases the risk.  Find an Eye MD near you at www.aao.org.

question: HI, I HAVE USED READING GLASS FOR SOME TIME. ECENTLY HAD A STROKE, DIAGNOSED WITH TYPE 2 DIABETES, AND H BLOOD PRESSURE. BEING TREATED NOW . QUESTION,  MY EYSIGHT SEEMS TO NOT BE 100 PERCENT. DOESNT SEEM TO TAKE ALL THE LIGHT IN. NOT BLURRY, JUST NOT ALL THERE . WONDER WHAT THIS MAY BE AND IF IT WILL CORRECT ON ITS ON AS I GET BETTER WITH THE OTHER PROBLEMS.  THANK YOU
title: KINDA FUZZY
